doc.title: Chloroformed, Gassed and Fondled 2
doc.plot: Three story lines in this chloroform and fondling video. In the first, Tina dresses for a party, but the neighborhood stalker has decided that she should spend the evening with him. He sneaks up behind the lovely lady, chloroforms her and fondles and gropes her lovely body. In the second story, Sasia's interview with a movie director turns out badly - the director has drugged her drink so that she can not resist his wandering hands. In the last tale, Tyler returns home a drunken state and cannot fight off a stalker who is determined to tease and fondle the lovely brunette.
